name: Birthday Sprinkles
description: I decided to create something with Perlin noise, but I want to create it with color. It reminds me of birthday cake sprinkles!

name: Fire
description: For the first variation of the perlin noise, I wanted to replicate fire through linear gradients and opacity change. I got this idea since Perlin noise resembles smoke so much in its smooth movements.

name: Disco lights
description: For this second variation of perlin noise, I integrated another color in the gradient and made the background black to create a disco effect. The squares also vary in rotation randomly.

name: Optical illusion squares
description: For the second recreation I created these randomized squares that have different stroke weights. I was inspired by an image found on google. I liked the trippyness of it and wanted to create something similar using randomness. They also move a tiny bit up, down, left or right to create movement.

name: Pointy flowers
description: For the first variation of the optical illusion I created these flower-like objects that have randomized color and rotation.

name: Artsy circles
description: For the second variation of the optical illusion I created these varied the shape by makeing them ellipses with the randomized color, stroke and rotation still implemented. I also made them downsize and move father to the edges using offset radius.

name: Marble stone
description: For the more complex experimenting, I knew I wanted to use flow fields. When working with it, the structures forming started reminding me of stone, specifically marble. So I made the backgroud gray and randomised the color of the lines between black and white using Math.random.

name: Flow fields version 2
